document.full_text: the surprise team of the stanley cup playoffs, the tampa bay lightning, advanced to the semifinal stage of the tournament last week by sweeping the top-seeded, glamorous washington capitals, an outcome few had predicted.
document.title: role players help the lightning strike twice in playoff series
lines_and_colors: the surprise team of the stanley cup playoffs, the tampa bay lightning, advanced to the semifinal stage of the tournament last week by sweeping the top-seeded, glamorous washington capitals, an outcome few had predicted.
